name: image.js
update datetime
set global
custom_nb_step
label: Number of steps in between two images

name: img_counter.js
func:
img_counter=global.get('img_counter')
img_counter=img_counter+1
global.set('img_counter',img_counter)
msg.payload = img_counter
return msg;

name: obj_counter.js
func:
obj_counter=global.get('obj_counter')
obj_counter=obj_counter+1
global.set('obj_counter',obj_counter)
msg.payload = obj_counter
return msg;

name: action
func:
#!/usr/bin/python
import smbus
import time
bus = smbus.SMBus(1)
time.sleep(1)
#turn off fan RGB
bus.write_byte_data(0x0d, 0x07, 0x00)
bus.write_byte_data(0x0d, 0x07, 0x00)

msg["payload"] = str(msg["topic"])+' now'
return msg

name: set object_time
set object_date
set optical config
pump.js
focus_distance
label: Distance in µm
tooltip: The actual distance moved will be in 25µm increment

name: focus.js

info:
# PlanktonScope Help
This Node will read the content of the file named **config.txt** containing all the input placeholders.

name: on_load
info:
# PlanktonScope Help
When the **Pi** is booting, **Node-RED** will be initiated and this node will be activated once and execute the following nodes.

name: set global
Stream Pi Camera
format:
<center><iframe id="inlineFrameExample"
    title="Inline Frame Example"
    height="600"
    width="800"
    frameborder="0"
    src="http://planktoscope.local:8000/index.html">
</iframe></center>

name: round focus_distance
